trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKZA016_04195_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Parbeloix is in search of someone skilled with a weapon.
TEXT_AKTKZA016_04195_TODO_00<tab>Consult the illustration to find and obtain sample 316.
TEXT_AKTKZA016_04195_TODO_01<tab>Deliver sample 316 to Parbeloix.

TEXT_AKTKZA016_04195_PARBELOIX_000_000<tab><var 08 E905 ((Madam)) ((Sir)) /var>, I say, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>. I seem to be in a bit of a bind, and I was wondering if you might lend your aid to remedy the plight of a struggling student.
TEXT_AKTKZA016_04195_PARBELOIX_000_001<tab>Oh, of course─introductions. I am Parbeloix, from the Studium, where my research involves the finer points of bacteria and fungi.
TEXT_AKTKZA016_04195_PARBELOIX_000_002<tab>I'm here to harvest mushrooms from Labyrinthos for my experiments, but I'm afraid I may be in over my head.

TEXT_AKTKZA016_04195_PARBELOIX_000_003<tab>You see, the mushrooms are located in the thirty-third facet, but that shaft is positively swarming with things I can scarce stand to look at, let alone face in combat.

TEXT_AKTKZA016_04195_PARBELOIX_000_004<tab>It isn't uncommon for members of the Studium to request help from the more martially inclined, and so here I am before you. Will you procure the mushrooms for me? I would be forever in your debt.

TEXT_AKTKZA016_04195_PARBELOIX_000_005<tab>Oh, thank you, good <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>! Well then, the sample number for my plot is three-one-six. The mushrooms stand out among the others, with red caps and a distinctive triangle shape.

TEXT_AKTKZA016_04195_PARBELOIX_000_006<tab>Just in case, however, I do have this illustration. I understand all too well the impulse to become lost gazing at the fungi─perhaps this will help keep you on track.
TEXT_AKTKZA016_04195_PARBELOIX_000_007<tab>If you find the sheer variety of mushrooms to be overwhelming, then simply consult the picture and it should put you back on track.

TEXT_AKTKZA016_04195_PARBELOIX_000_008<tab>Please return with the crop labeled sample three-one-six. If you forget how they look, simply consult the illustration I gave you and resume the merry harvest.
TEXT_AKTKZA016_04195_SYSTEM_000_010<tab>These don't appear to be the correct mushrooms, although they do have a certain charm...
TEXT_AKTKZA016_04195_SYSTEM_000_011<tab>This appears to be an illustration of sample 316. Find the matching mushrooms within the vast thirty-third facet.
TEXT_AKTKZA016_04195_SYSTEM_000_012<tab>These mushrooms match the illustration in your hands. Your long search is over!
TEXT_AKTKZA016_04195_PARBELOIX_000_020<tab>Well, I can see by the dirt on your boots that you did some manner of digging. Were you able to find my sample?
TEXT_AKTKZA016_04195_PARBELOIX_000_021<tab>Ah, yes, these match my illustration exactly! Thank the Twelve that the brave of heart still walk this realm.

TEXT_AKTKZA016_04195_PARBELOIX_000_022<tab>Do you have an interest in fungi yourself? These were developed from the spores of the elfstool, which can only be found in the Aurum Vale. A rare mushroom, but these are superior in every way.
TEXT_AKTKZA016_04195_PARBELOIX_000_023<tab>For one, they are much less inclined to kill you. A vast improvement by any measure of the word.
TEXT_AKTKZA016_04195_PARBELOIX_000_024<tab>Of course, I've had my failures, but the less said about those, the better. What matters is now, and the revolution sample three-one-six is sure to herald!
TEXT_AKTKZA016_04195_SYSTEM_000_025<tab>A picture of sample 316.
